Summary: very bright shiney polished gold cross heading east at high speed vanishes
divs: Sighting Details My mother witnessed it, i am here typing this in for her and now im gonna let her type what she saw.: I saw what I thought was a jet in the sky. It had 2 contrails. It was moving very fast. The sky was very clear with no clouds. What really caught my attention was the color of this jet. I looked at the jet to get a better view. It was cross shaped . This jet was extremely bright, very shiny ,and pale gold in color. I ran to the door and told my son to come look at it , but just that soon it was already gone and the contrails also had disappeared . The jet was going east. No trace of it at all was left in the sky.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kentwood
This sighting has never been favorited.
